```{r}

```

```{r}
AJ <- read.csv("Applejuice.csv")
InvPrice <- 1/AJ$Price
reg.1 <-lm(data=AJ, Sales ~ InvPrice)
summary(reg.1)
```

```{r}
confint(reg.1,'InvPrice',level=0.99)
```

```{r}
pred1 <- data.frame(InvPrice = 1/2.5)
predict(reg.1, pred1, interval="prediction",level=0.99)
```


```{r}
logSales <- log(AJ$Sales)
reg.2 <-lm(data=AJ, logSales ~ Price)
summary(reg.2)
```
```{r}
pred2 <- data.frame(Price = 2.5)
predict(reg.2, pred2, interval="prediction",level=0.99)
```
